name: Nanotech Partners
overview: Nanotech Partners I Limited Partnership is a unique private equity fund that focuses exclusively on nanotechnology around the world. With the sponsorship of Mitsubishi Corporation, the fund was established after Nanotech Partners, Ltd. was founded as a General Partner in September 2001. The fund investors are Mitsubishi Corporation, Mitsubishi Chemical Corporation and Honjo Chemical Corporation. The objective of the fund is to generate long-term capital gains for its investors through global investments in new nanotechnology businesses . Investors have the great opportunity to gain from these businesses’ outstanding growth potential and access valuable information on technology and the commercialization of nanotechnology. The fund is globally managed by Nanotech Partners Limited, with the support of the oversea local offices of Mitsubishi Corporation.

funding_round.source_description: InPhase Technologies Closes $32.1 Million Third Round of Funding
